title: Hero Content Update
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN content in the hero gets updated to a game
OR content in the hero gets updated to an SLIVE
OR content in the hero gets updated to an FLIVE
OR content in the hero gets updated to a VOD/SVOD
custom_expected:
THEN the content is updated successfully
AND no error messages are displayed
AND focus is not lost from the page

title: Favorite team game is pre-game
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND a game with the user's favorite team is present in the hero
AND the game is in a pre-game/scheduled state
AND the mediaState=MEDIA_OFF
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND the away team logo displays and away team name are displayed
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND a blue pill displays left justified above the away team logo
AND the scheduled game time displays in the user's local timezone
AND a "Watch Now" button does NOT display
AND a "LIVE" indicator pill does NOT display

title: Favorite team game is pre-game - blacked out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND the user's favorite team game is displaying in the Hero
AND the user's location is in the viewing market of the game
AND the game is not a partner game (AppleTV+, Peacock, etc.)
AND the game is pre-game/scheduled
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero 
AND the away team logo and away team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND a blue pill displays left justified above the away team logo
AND the scheduled game time displays in the user's local timezone
AND a "BLACKOUT" pill is displayed left justified above the away team
AND the "Watch Now" button does not display if the user is blacked out

title: Favorite team game is live
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND a game with the user's favorite team is present in the hero
AND the game is in a preview/live state
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND a red pill with white "LIVE" text displays above the away team logo
AND the away team logo displays and away team name are displayed
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the "Watch Live" button is white with black text
AND the "Watch Live" button has focus when the Home page loads
AND game playback at the live point is successful after the user selects the "Watch Live" button
AND the user's favorite team feed begins playback

title: Favorite team game is live - game not entitled free subscriber
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is not entitled for live game playback (free subscriber)
AND a game with the user's favorite team is present in the hero
AND the game is in a preview/live state
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND a red pill with white "LIVE" text displays above the away team logo
AND the away team logo displays and away team name are displayed
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the "Watch Live" button is white with black text
AND the "Watch Live" button has focus when the Home page loads
AND a lock icon displays in the "Watch Live" button 
AND the user lands on the paywall/subscriptions page after selecting the "Watch Live" button w/ a lock icon

title: Favorite team game is live - game not entitled single team subscriber
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a single team subscriber
AND the user's favorite team is different from the subscribed team
AND a game with the user's favorite team is present in the hero
AND the game in the hero does not contain the subscribed team
AND the game is in a preview/live state
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND a red pill with white "LIVE" text displays above the away team logo
AND the away team logo displays and away team name are displayed
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the "Watch Live" button is white with black text
AND the "Watch Live" button has focus when the Home page loads
AND a lock icon displays in the "Watch Live" button 
AND the user lands on the paywall/subscriptions page after selecting the "Watch Live" button w/ a lock icon

title: Favorite team game is live - home team not entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a single team subscriber
AND a game with the user's subscribed team is present in the hero
AND the subscribed team is the away team
AND the game is in a preview/live state
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND a red pill with white "LIVE" text displays above the away team logo
AND the away team logo displays and away team name are displayed
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the "Watch Live" button is white with black text
AND the "Watch Live" button has focus when the Home page loads
AND the away feed begins playback after selecting the "Watch Live" button

title: Favorite team game is live - away team not entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is a single team subscriber
AND a game with the user's subscribed team is present in the hero
AND the subscribed team is the home team
AND the game is in a preview/live state
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND a red pill with white "LIVE" text displays above the away team logo
AND the away team logo displays and away team name are displayed
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the "Watch Live" button is white with black text
AND the "Watch Live" button has focus when the Home page loads
AND the home feed begins playback after selecting the "Watch Live" button

title: Favorite team game is live - blacked out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND the user's favorite team game is displaying in the Hero
AND the user's location is in the viewing market of the game
AND the game is not a partner game (AppleTV+, Peacock, etc.)
AND the game is live/in-progress
custom_steps: WHEN the user is on the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero 
AND the away team logo and away team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND a LIVE pill is displayed left justified above the away team
AND a pill with text "BLACKOUT" is displayed above the away team to the right of the LIVE pill indicator
AND the "Watch Now" button does not display if the user is blacked out

title: Favorite team game is final not archived
custom_expected:
PS5TV-16
- verify a background image related to the user's favorite team is displayed in the hero when a game with the user's favorite team is present in the hero

PS5TV-323
- verify the away team logo and away team name are displayed in the Hero when a game is displayed in the hero
- verify the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero when a game is displayed in the hero

PS5TV-325
- verify "Watch Now" button is white with black text
- verify the "Watch Now" button has focus when the Home page loads

title: Favorite team game is final archived
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for archive game playback
AND an archive game with the user's favorite team is present in the hero
custom_steps: WHEN a user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND a "LIVE" indicator pill does NOT display
AND the away team logo displays and away team name are displayed
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the "Watch Now" button is white with black text
and the "Watch Now" button has focus when the Home page loads
AND game playback is successful after the user selects the "Watch Now" button
AND the favorite team feed begins playback

title: Non-Favorite team game is live - blacked out
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a game that doesn't contain a user's favorite team is in progress
AND all other games are in a preview/schedule or final state
AND the user is blacked out of the in progress game (game level blackedOutVideo = true)
AND the in progress game is in the Hero
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the in progress game in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN a background image related to the home team is displayed in the hero
AND the blackout pill displays above the matchup, to the right of the live pill
AND the away team logo and away team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the home team logo and home team name are displayed in the Hero
AND the "Watch Now" button does not display

title: AppleTV+
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user's favorite team is playing in an AppleTV+ game
AND the user does not have the EXEC entitlement
custom_steps: WHEN an AppleTV+ game is present in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN a white circle icon with the AppleTV+ logo displays to the right of the blue game time pill above the away team 
OR a white circle icon with the AppleTV+ logo displays to the right of the LIVE badge above the away team
AND the text "Watch on AppleTV+" displays to the right of the AppleTV+ logo above the away team
AND AppleTV+ messaging is displayed in the feed select modal after selecting the "Watch Now"/"Watch Live" button
AND the user is unable to playback the video feed

title: Peacock
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user's favorite team is playing in a Peacock game
AND the user does not have the EXEC entitlement
custom_steps: WHEN a Peacock game is present in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN a white circle icon with the Peacock logo displays to the right of the blue game time pill above the away team
OR a white circle icon with the Peacock logo displays to the right of the LIVE badge above the away team
AND the text "Watch on Peacock" displays to the right of the Peacock logo above the away team
AND Peacock messaging is displayed in the feed select modal after selecting the "Watch Live" button
AND the user is unable to playback the video feed

title: Free Game of the Day
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user's favorite team is playing in a Free Game of the Day
AND the user is logged in
AND the user does not have the EXEC entitlement
custom_steps: WHEN a Free Game of the Day is present in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN a white circle icon with the MLB Batter-man logo displays to the right of the blue game time pill above the away team 
OR a white circle icon with the MLB Batter-man logo displays to the right of the LIVE badge above the away team
AND the text "Free Game of the Day" displays to the right of the MLB Batter-man logo above the away team
AND the user is able to playback the video feed after selecting the "Watch Now"/"Watch Live" button if the game is live

title: Watch Now button displays when MEDIA_ON
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND a live game is present in the hero
AND the live game has broadcasters assigned
AND the video feeds mediaState = MEDIA_ON
custom_steps: WHEN the live game displays in the hero
custom_expected:
THEN the "Watch Live" button displays
AND playback successfully starts at the live point after the user selects the "Watch Live" button

title: Watch Now button does not display when MEDIA_OFF
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is entitled for live game playback
AND a scheduled game is present in the hero
AND the scheduled game has broadcasters assigned
AND the video feeds mediaState = MEDIA_OFF
custom_steps: WHEN the scheduled game displays in the hero
custom_expected:
THEN the "Watch Live" button does not display
AND the user is unable to start playback

title: No Broadcasters Available
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an entitled user is logged in
AND the user is on the Home page
AND a non-blacked out game without broadcasters is on the schedule
custom_steps: WHEN the non-blacked out game without broadcasters is present in the Hero
custom_expected: THEN "No Broadcast Available" displays below the home team, left aligned with the team logos

title: ESPN MVPD - Unauthorized
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a Postseason game is on the schedule
AND ESPN broadcasters are assigned
AND the user's location is in the USA
AND a user is unauthorized for ESPN MVPD
AND the game level entitledVideo = false
AND the feed level espnAuthRequired = true
custom_steps: WHEN the Postseason game with ESPN broadcasters is present in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN the MVPD pill displays above the Hero title / game match up
AND MVPD messaging displays below the Hero title / game match up

AND MVPD text does not display below the Hero title / game match up

OR the All-Star Game is on the schedule
AND FOX broadcasters are assigned
AND the user's location is International non-Canada
AND the game level entitledVideo = true
AND the game level blackedOutVideo = false
AND the AWAY (National) feed level foxAuthRequired = true
AND the HOME (International) feed level foxAuthRequired = false

custom_expected:
THEN the MVPD pill does not display above the Hero title / game match up
AND MVPD text does not display below the Hero title / game match up
AND the user is able to achieve playback after the "Watch Live" button is selected

title: Game Data - Pregame - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds: GIVEN Hide Spoilers is OFF
custom_steps: WHEN a scheduled game is present in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN the away team probable pitcher with stats displays below the away team name
AND the home team probable pitcher with stats displays below the home team name
AND the pitcher info is displayed as <firstInitial. lastName> | <pitcher season Win-Loss record> | <pitcher season ERA>

title: Game Data - Pregame - Pitcher Unavailable - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds: GIVEN Hide Spoilers is OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN a scheduled game is present in the Hero
AND a Probable Pitcher has not been assigned to the game
custom_expected: THEN "Probable Pitcher Unavailable" displays below the team name that has not assigned a probable pitcher

title: Game Data - Live - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_preconds: GIVEN Hide Spoilers is OFF
custom_steps: WHEN an in-progress live game is present in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN the current away team score is displayed to the right of the away team name
AND the current home team score is displayed to the right of the home team name
AND the current inning data is displayed below the home team logo
AND the current base runners data is displayed in a paw print configuration to the right of the inning data, below the home team name
AND the current balls-strikes data is displayed to the right of base runners paw print, below the home team name
AND the current inning Outs data is displayed to the right of the balls-strikes, below the home team name

title: Game States - Preview/Scheduled - Delayed - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN a game is in a Preview/Scheduled state
AND the game is Delayed
AND one of the following statusCode's are present in the MAST response: (PV,PP,PY,PE,PA,PO,PR,PS,PG,PF,PC,PD,PB,PL,PI)
custom_expected: THEN a pill with the text "DELAYED" is displayed above the team info in the Hero

title: Game States - Live - Delayed - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN a game is in a Live state
AND the game is Delayed
AND one of the following statusCode's are present in the MAST response: (IV,IP,IY,IE,IA,IO,IZ,IR,IS,IG,IF,IC,ID,IB,IL,II))
custom_expected: THEN a pill with the text "DELAYED" is displayed above the team info in the Hero

title: Game States - Live - Suspended - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN a game is in a Live state
AND the game is Suspended
AND one of the following statusCode's are present in the MAST response: (T,TR,TS,TG,TV,TF,TC,TD,TB,TP,TL,TE,TA,TO,TI,TU,UR,US,UG,UV,UF,UC,UD,UP,UL,UE,UA,UO,U,UZ,UI,UU)
custom_expected: THEN a pill with the text "SUSPENDED" is displayed above the team info in the Hero

title: Game States - Final - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN a game is in a Final state
AND is present in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN a black pill with white text "FINAL" is displayed above the team info in the Hero
AND the final score does display in the Hero

title: Game States - Final - Cancelled - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN a game is in a Final state
AND the game is Cancelled
AND one of the following statusCode's are present in the MAST response: (CR,CS,CG,CV,CF,CC,CD,CB,CP,CL,CE,CA,CO,CI)
custom_expected:
THEN a pill with the text "FINAL" is displayed above the team info in the Hero
AND a pill with the text "CANCELLED" is displayed above the team info in the Hero, to the right of the "FINAL" pill

title: Game States - Final - Postponed - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN a game is in a Final state
AND the game is Postponed
AND one of the following statusCode's are present in the MAST response: (DR,DS,DG,DV,DF,DC,DD,DB,DP,Dl,DE,DA,DO,DI)
custom_expected:
THEN a pill with the text "FINAL" is displayed above the team info in the Hero
AND a pill with the text "POSTPONED" is displayed above the team info in the Hero, to the right of the "FINAL" pill

title: Game States - Final - Forfeit - Hide Spoilers OFF
custom_steps:
WHEN a game is in a Final state
AND one of the teams in the game has Forfeited
AND one of the following statusCode's are present in the MAST response: (Q,QK,QX,QQ,QJ,QI,QN,QV,QR,QO,R,RR,RK,RX,RQ,RJ,RI,RN,RV,RO)
custom_expected: THEN a pill with the text "<TRICODE of forfeit team> - FORFEIT" is displayed above the team info in the Hero

title: Hero Title and Description
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in
AND a game is not present in the Hero
AND MAST is returning "live: true" in the hero node of the MAST response

NOTE: MAST call example
https://mastapi.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com/api/epg/v3/search?exp=LEGACY&favoriteTeam=119
custom_steps: WHEN Forge content is displaying in the Hero
custom_expected:
THEN the title displays the value of the "heading" key in the returned Dapi url of the MAST call
AND the description displays the value of the "text" key in the returned Dapi url of the MAST call

NOTE: Dapi URL from MAST call example https://dapi-qa.mlbinfra.com/v2/content/en-us/vsmcontents/mlbn-live (found in the hero node of the response)

title: MLB Network Entitled - Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is entitled with the MLB Network entitlement (MLBN)
AND a game for the subscribers favorite team is not present in the Hero
AND an MLB Network feed is returned in the "featured" node in the MAST response
AND "live: true" is returned in the the "hero" node in the MAST response
custom_steps: WHEN the subscriber loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN MLB Network displays in the Hero
AND a "Watch Now" button displays without a lock icon
AND the MLB Network feed plays back after the user selects the "Watch Now" button

title: MLB Network Entitled - Games Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is entitled with the MLB Network entitlement (MLBN or EXECMLB)
AND a game for the subscribers favorite team is present in the Hero
AND an MLB Network feed is returned in the "featured" node in the MAST response
AND "live: false" is returned in the the "hero" node in the MAST response
custom_steps: WHEN the subscriber loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN an MLB Network tile displays in the Games carousel
AND the MLB Network feed plays back after the user selects the tile in the Games carousel

title: MLB Network Not Entitled - Hero
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is not entitled with the MLB Network entitlement (MLBN)
AND a game for the subscribers favorite team is not present in the Hero
AND an MLB Network feed is returned in the "featured" node in the MAST response
AND "live: true" is returned in the the "hero" node in the MAST response
custom_steps: WHEN the subscriber loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN MLB Network displays in the Hero
AND a "Watch Now" button displays with a lock icon
AND the Paywall page displays after the user selects the "Watch Now" button

title: MLB Network Not Entitled - Games Carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is not entitled with the MLB Network entitlement (MLBN)
AND a game for the subscribers favorite team is present in the Hero
AND an MLB Network feed is returned in the "featured" node in the MAST response
AND "live: false" is returned in the the "hero" node in the MAST response
custom_steps: WHEN the subscriber loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN an MLB Network tile displays in the Games carousel
AND a lock icon displays in the upper right corner of the tile
AND the Paywall page displays after the user selects the tile in the Games carousel

title: Games Carousel UI
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is logged in
AND the subscriber has a favorite team
AND the favorite team game is in the Hero
custom_steps: WHEN the user views the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN the days games are displayed in a carousel below the Hero
AND the carousel is labeled "Games"
AND the tiles are displayed in the same order as the EPG response
AND 4 full game tiles are displayed
AND a 5th game tile is peaking on the far right side of the screen
AND the game present in the Hero is not displayed in the Games carousel

**NOTE**
QA EPG: https://mastapi.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com/api/epg/v3/search?favoriteTeam=144&cachebust=true
PROD EPG: https://mastapi.mobile.mlbinfra.com/api/epg/v3/search?favoriteTeam=144&cachebust=true
UPDATE FAVORITE TEAM IN URL TO TEST ACCOUNT FAVORITE TEAM

title: No Scheduled Games - Offseason/All-Star break
custom_preconds: GIVEN there are no games scheduled for the day
custom_steps: WHEN the user loads the Home page
custom_expected: THEN the Games carousel should not display

title: One Scheduled Game - ASG/Postseason
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is 1 game scheduled for the day
AND the 1 game is present in the Hero
custom_steps: WHEN the user loads the Home page
custom_expected: THEN the Games carousel should not display

title: Games carousel date flip
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Home page
AND the current time is before 10am ET
AND games were on the schedule yesterday
AND games are on the schedule today
custom_steps:
WHEN the user is stagnate on the Home page
AND time passes the 10am ET threshold
custom_expected:
THEN the games carousel updates with today's games
AND yesterday's games are not displayed in the Games Carousel

title: Exit Game to Home Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN I am logged into mlb.com
AND the game must be a LIVE game
custom_steps:
WHEN I click on any LIVE game
AND I click the play indicator to stop playing the game
AND I click on "MTV.Home"
custom_expected:
THEN the game should stop playing
AND I should be returned to the MLB.TV | Welcome Center | MLB.com page

custom_expected:

custom_steps: WHEN the user land on mlb.com

AND focus should return to the previously selected game tile

AND the user should be returned back to the Home page

title: Dismiss Feed Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the subscriber is logged into mlb.com
AND the subscriber is entitled for archive game playback
AND the subscriber has initiated archive game playback from the Games carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user lands on mlb.com
custom_expected:
THEN the video player should be dismissed
AND the user should be returned back to the Home page
AND focus should be assigned to the "Watch Now" button in the Hero

title: Basic non-game tiles - entitled unfocused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
OR the user is a free user
AND the user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a user with SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement views an unfocused VOD/SVOD/FLIVE/SLIVE basic tile
OR a free user views an unfocused VOD/FLIVE basic tile
custom_expected:
THEN the associated thumbnail displays
AND the duration of the VOD/SVOD content is displayed in the lower left corner of the thumbnail
AND the title is displayed left justified below the associated thumbnail
AND the video published date is displayed left justified below the title
AND the user does not see a lock icon in the upper right corner of the tile
AND the tile is the same width as the game tiles
AND two tiles are the same width as one featured tile

title: Basic non-game tiles - entitled focused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
OR the user is a free user
AND the user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a user with SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement views a focused VOD/SVOD/FLIVE/SLIVE basic tile
OR a free user views a focused VOD/FLIVE basic tile
custom_expected:
THEN the tile has a white border to indicate focus
AND the associated thumbnail displays
AND the duration of the VOD/SVOD content is displayed in the lower left corner of the thumbnail
AND the title is displayed left justified below the associated thumbnail
AND the video description displays left justified below the title
AND user does not see a lock icon in the upper right corner of the tile
AND the tile is the same width as the game tiles
AND two tiles are the same width as one featured tile

title: Basic non-game tiles - not entitled unfocused

GIVEN the user is a free subscriber

AND the user is logged in
OR the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a logged in user views an unfocused SVOD basic tile
OR a not logged in user views any unfocused non-game basic tile
custom_expected:
THEN the associated thumbnail displays
AND the duration of the SVOD content is displayed in the lower left corner of the thumbnail
AND the title is displayed left justified below the associated thumbnail
AND the video published date is displayed left justified below the title
AND the user sees a lock icon in the upper right corner of the tile
AND the tile is the same width as the game tiles
AND two tiles are the same width as one featured tile

title: Basic non-game tiles - not entitled focused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free subscriber
AND the user does not have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user is logged in
OR the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a logged in user views a focused SVOD basic tile
OR a not logged in user views any focused non-game basic tile
custom_expected:
THEN the tile has a white border to indicate focus
AND the associated thumbnail displays
AND the duration of the SVOD content is displayed in the lower left corner of the thumbnail
AND the title is displayed left justified below the associated thumbnail
AND the video description displays left justified below the title
AND user sees a lock icon in the upper right corner of the tile
AND the tile is the same width as the game tiles
AND two tiles are the same width as one featured tile

title: Featured non-game tiles - entitled unfocused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
OR the user is a free user
AND the user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a user with SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement views an unfocused VOD/SVOD/FLIVE/SLIVE featured tile
OR a free user views an unfocused VOD/FLIVE featured tile
custom_expected:
THEN the featured tiles are the size of 2 basic forge content tiles
AND the associated thumbnail displays as the background of the entire tile
AND there is a slight gradient from the bottom of the tile
AND the title displays left justified at the bottom of the tile
AND the video duration is displayed left justified above the title
AND the video published date displays to the right of the video duration
AND a lock icon is not displayed in the upper right corner of the tile

title: Featured non-game tiles - entitled focused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
OR the user is a free user
AND the user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a user with SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement views a focused VOD/SVOD/FLIVE/SLIVE basic tile
OR a free user views a focused VOD/FLIVE basic tile
custom_expected:
THEN featured tiles are the size of 2 regular forge content tiles
AND the tile has a white border when focused
AND the associated thumbnail displays as the background of the entire tile
AND there is a slight gradient from the bottom of the tile
AND the video description displays left justified at the bottom of the game tile
AND the title displays left justified above the video description
AND the video duration is displayed left justified above the title
AND the video published date displays to the right of the video duration
AND a lock icon is not displayed in the upper right corner of the tile

title: Featured non-game tiles - not entitled unfocused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free subscriber
AND the user does not have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user is logged in
OR the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a logged in user views an unfocused SVOD feature tile
OR a not logged in user views any unfocused non-game feature tile
custom_expected:
THEN the featured tiles are the size of 2 regular forge content tiles
AND the associated thumbnail displays as the background of the entire tile
AND there is a slight gradient from the bottom
AND the title displays left justified at the bottom of the tile
AND the video duration is displayed left justified above the title
AND the video published date displays to the right of the video duration
AND a lock icon is displayed in the upper right corner of the tile

title: Featured non-game tiles - not entitled focused
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free subscriber
AND the user does not have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user is logged in
OR the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a logged in user views a focused SVOD featured tile
OR a not logged in user views any focused non-game featured tile
custom_expected:
THEN featured tiles are the size of 2 regular forge content tiles
AND the tile has a white border when focused
AND the associated thumbnail displays as the background of the entire tile
AND there is a slight gradient from the bottom
AND the video description displays left justified at the bottom of the game tile
AND the title displays left justified above the video description
AND the video duration is displayed left justified above the title
AND the video published date displays to the right of the video duration
AND a lock icon is displayed in the upper right corner of the tile

title: Basic non-game tile selection - entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
OR the user is a free user
AND the user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a user with SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement selects an VOD/SVOD/FLIVE/SLIVE basic tile for playback
OR a free user selects a VOD/FLIVE basic tile for playback
custom_expected:
THEN the entitled user is able to playback content
AND playback starts at the beginning
AND the scrubber displays for 10 seconds before being dismissed
AND users are navigated to the Home page after pressing the CIRCLE button on the controller
AND focus gets assigned to the "Watch Now" button in the hero

**Note:** If "Watch Now" button is not present in the Hero, focus should be assigned to the Home tab in the navigation header

title: Basic non-game tile selection - not entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free subscriber
AND the user does not have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user is logged in
OR the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a logged in user selects an SVOD/SLIVE basic tile for playback
OR a not logged in user selects any non-game basic tile for playback
custom_expected:
AND the not entitled user is unable to playback content
AND the not entitled user is navigated to the Subscriptions/Paywall page after selecting not entitled content
AND the not entitled user is navigated to the Home page after pressing the CIRCLE button on the controller
AND focus is assigned to the "Watch Now" button in the hero

**Note:** If "Watch Now" button is not present in the Hero, focus should be assigned to the Home tab in the navigation header

title: Featured non-game tile selection - entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
OR the user is a free user
AND the user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a subscriber selects an SVOD/SLIVE featured tile for playback
OR a free user selects a VOD/FLIVE featured tile for playback
custom_expected:
THEN the entitled user is able to playback content
AND playback starts at the beginning
AND the scrubber displays for 10 seconds before being dismissed
AND users are navigated to the Home page after pressing the CIRCLE button on the controller
AND focus gets assigned to the "Watch Now" button in the hero

**Note:** If "Watch Now" button is not present in the Hero, focus should be assigned to the Home tab in the navigation header

title: Featured non-game tile selection - not entitled
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is a free subscriber
AND the user does not have the SUBSCRIBERVOD entitlement
AND the user is logged in
OR the user is not logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN a logged in user selects an SVOD featured tile for playback
OR a not logged in user selects any non-game featured tile for playback
custom_expected:
THEN the user is unable to playback content
AND the not entitled user is navigated to the Subscriptions/Paywall page after selecting not entitled content
AND the not entitled user is navigated to the Home page after pressing the BACK button on the controller
AND focus is assigned to the "Watch Now" button in the hero

**Note:** If "Watch Now" button is not present in the Hero, focus should be assigned to the Home tab in the navigation header

title: Favorite team carousel displays
custom_preconds:
Given a user has an MLB account
AND a favorite team is set
custom_steps: WHEN the user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN the users favorite team carousel called "{team_name} Most Popular", displays below the MLB Most Popular carousel
AND content is present in the favorite team carousel
AND the user is able to playback content from the carousel

title: MiLB carousel displays
custom_preconds:
Given a user has an MLB account
AND a favorite team is set
custom_steps: WHEN the user loads the Home page
custom_expected:
THEN a carousel called "{team_name} Affiliated MiLB Games", displays below the Games carousel
AND content is present in the MiLB carousel
AND the user is able to playback content from the carousel

title: Favorite team carousel doesn't display
custom_preconds:
Given a user has an MLB account
AND a favorite team is not set
custom_steps: WHEN the user loads the Home page
custom_expected: THEN a carousel called "{team_name} Most Popular" does not display on the Home page

title: MiLB carousel doesn't display
custom_preconds:
Given a user has an MLB account
AND a favorite team is not set
custom_steps: WHEN the user loads the Home page
custom_expected: THEN a carousel called "{team_name} Affiliated MiLB Games" doesn't display on the Home page

title: Basic non-game tiles - title length
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the title of a piece of Forge content (VOD/SVOD) has a title length that is equal to, or greater than, 100 characters and spaces combined

**Example:** In the "Colorado Rockies Most Popular" carousel, video title "Juan Soto singles on a ground ball to shortstop Ezequiel Tovar.  Fernando Tatis Jr.  out at home, shortstop Ezequiel Tovar to first baseman Elehuris Montero to second baseman Brendan Rodgers to pitcher Brent Suter."
custom_steps: WHEN a user views the basic non-game tile that contains a very long title
custom_expected: THEN the end of the third title line in the tile displays an ellipsis (...)

title: Jump to navigation header on Home page
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates to the bottom of the Home page
OR assigns focus to any element on the page
AND the user presses the [triangle] button on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the [Home] button in the navigation header at the top of the screen gains focus
AND the page scrolls to the top
AND the user stays on the Home page

title: Anonymous user header navigation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN an anonymous user has previously gone through the "Explore Free Content" onboarding flow
AND the anonymous user launches the app
AND the Home page displays
custom_steps: WHEN the d-pad, left analog stick is used to navigate to each of the buttons in the navigation header
custom_expected:
THEN each button gains focus as it is navigated to
AND as each button gains focus the text color changes from white to black
AND as each button gains focus the background color changes from no background to white background

title: Home page load
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is not on the Home page
custom_steps: WHEN a user selects the Home tab in the navigation header
custom_expected: THEN the Home page loads

title: Assign Focus - Home tab to Watch Now button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is entitled for video playback
AND playable content is present in the hero
AND focus is assigned to the Home tab in the navigation header
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the down arrow on the controller
custom_expected: THEN focus is assigned to the "Watch Now" button in the Hero

title: Assign Focus - Watch Now button to first carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is entitled for video playback
AND playable content is present in the hero
AND focus is on the "Watch Now" button in the hero
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the down arrow on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN focus is indicated with a white border around the tile
AND focus is assigned to the first carousel
AND focus is assigned to the furthest left full tile in the carousel

title: Assign Focus - Home tab to first carousel
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is entitled for video playback
AND non-playable content (scheduled game) is present in the hero
AND focus is assigned to the Home tab in the navigation header
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the down arrow on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN focus is indicated with a white border around the tile
AND focus is assigned to the first carousel
AND focus is assigned to the furthest left full tile in the carousel

title: Assign Focus - First carousel to Watch Now button
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is entitled for video playback
AND playable content is present in the hero
AND focus is assigned to the first carousel below the Hero
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the up arrow on the controller
custom_expected: THEN focus moves to the "Watch Now" button in the Hero

title: Assign Focus - Watch Now button to Home tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is entitled for video playback
AND playable content is present in the hero
AND focus is on the "Watch Now" button in the hero
custom_steps: WHEN a user presses the up arrow on the controller
custom_expected: THEN focus moves to the Home tab in the navigation header

title: Assign Focus - First carousel to Home tab
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a subscriber is entitled for video playback
AND non-playable content (scheduled game) is present in the hero
AND focus is assigned to the first carousel below the hero
custom_steps: WHEN a user presses the up arrow on the controller
custom_expected: THEN focus moves to the Home tab in the navigation header

title: Carousel navigation to the right
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Home page
AND focus is assigned to a carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the right arrow on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN focus remains on the furthest left full tile
AND the tile that was previously to the right of the focused tile is now in the focused position of the carousel
AND focus remains on the tile once the user reaches the last tile in the carousel
AND the user can no longer continue navigating right through the carousel once the end of the carousel has been reached

title: Carousel navigation to the left
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Home page
AND focus is assigned to a carousel
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the left arrow on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN focus remains on the furthest left full tile
AND the tile that was previously to the left of the focused tile is now in the focused position of the carousel
AND focus remains on the tile when the user is focused on the first tile in the carousel
AND the user can no longer continue navigating left through the carousel once the beginning of the carousel has been reached

title: Bookmarked carousel position navigating on Home page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates right or left through a carousel
AND focus is not on the first item in the carousel
AND the user navigates to a different carousel above or below
custom_expected:
THEN the previous carousel doesn't reset its position/order
AND the carousel doesn't reset its position/order after the user navigates back to the previous carousel

title: Bookmarked carousel position navigating away from Home page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Home page
AND focus is present in a carousel
AND focus is not assigned to the first item in a carousel
custom_steps:
WHEN the user navigates away from the Home page
AND the user navigates back to the Home page
custom_expected: THEN the previously focused carousel has been reset to its original order

title: Smooth scrolling during navigation
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is on the Home page
custom_steps:
WHEN the user presses the [UP] or [DOWN] buttons on the controller
AND the user presses the [LEFT] or [RIGHT] buttons on the controller
custom_expected:
THEN the screen smoothly scrolls vertical as the user navigates up and down the page
AND the carousels smoothly scroll horizontal as the user navigates left and right through the carousels

title: Settings to Home
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on the Home page
AND navigates to the Settings page
custom_steps: WHEN the user navigates back to the Home page
custom_expected: THEN the Home page loads with the most up to date information

title: LG Only - Back button prompts Exit
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is on the Home page
AND focus is assigned to the Home tab in the header navigation
custom_steps: WHEN the user presses the BACK button on the remote control
custom_expected:
THEN an LG/webOS modal displays
AND the modal asks the user if they want to quit the app
AND pressing "Exit" in the modal closes the app
OR pressing "Cancel" in the modal dismisses the modal
